attributes.action: Don't shut  down churches and turn them into Mosques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Churches are being closed down and made into mosques. This is a christian country.

If we don't do anything to fight for England then it will be a muslim country. Sharia law is already creeping into the legal system. This has to stop we must all protest about sharia law.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
